Race.SpecificTitle: PW School District -- Local Option - Term Limits
Race.FullText:
"LOCAL OPTION ELECTION
Within Caldwell Parish School District:
Shall the number of terms of office that any member of the school board may serve be limited to three consecutive four-year terms?"

Race.SpecificTitle: PW School Board (Cons. SD #1) -- 7.41 mills - SB - 10 yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition
(Consolidated School District Number One)
(Tax Continuation)

Summary:  10 year, 7.41 mills property tax continuation for giving additional support for current operations of the public schools of Consolidated School District Number One of Caldwell Parish.
Race.FullText: Shall Consolidated School District Number One of Caldwell Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a special tax of seven and forty-one hundredths (7.41) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $379,800 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2014 and ending with the year 2023, for the purpose of giving additional support for current operations of the public schools of the District, said millage to represent a twenty-two hundredths of a mill (.22) increase over the 7.19 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2013 pursuant to an election held on July 19, 2003?
